title: UserU
author: UserU
content: Like the title, anyone knows where do I post mine (it's about earning some beermoney)?I posted it in the Goods section but it got zapped

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Probably the off-topic section since we don't have a non-crypto related moneymaking subforum. Probably not the best section for visibility, but yea.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on September 04, 2022, 01:36:02 PMProbably the off-topic section since we don't have a non-crypto related moneymaking subforum. Probably not the best section for visibility, but yea.You're right, lots of spammy topics there...But I did some searching and seems that there were giveaways on eBooks and software like this

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: According to Guidelines for threads, the "Goods" board is for trading physical goods and that could be why your topic was deleted. I am not sure, but "Digital goods" sub-board may be appropriate for your topic.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on September 04, 2022, 01:48:40 PMAccording to Guidelines for threads, the "Goods" board is for trading physical goods and that could be why your topic was deleted. I am not sure, but "Digital goods" sub-board may be appropriate for your topic. Why didn't I think of that one, I'd give it a try.Thanks!
